Name: The Survivors
About the game: The survivors is a game in an open world populated by zombies and fanatical rebels but also survivors helped, craft and base bulding, missions are to be discovered What Is the Survivors Your transport plane has crashed you must survive the crash in a world populated by zombies and fanatics Game Features Discover A World Rich In Original Places Fight Different Style Of Zombies Fight Armed Fanatics build its base, manage its electricity, its resources, recruit npc's which will produce building materials, ammunition, care stop the proliferation of zombies by making traps Collect figurines from this world to decorate your base Meet other factions, complete helicopter rescue missions, reconstruction missions, delivery missions, deliver civilians, buy vehicles as rewards Gameplay Style it's An Survival Game Style. it's a deliberately arcade style, oriented on missions and action, and the discovery of the world, here you will only have few weapons in the often identical game play, no zombies to kill at 100m. Developpement : Road Map we plan to to add new vehicles and their improvements, zombie bosses, new missions and a trade system between factions.... what to Enjoy
